summary: Laila, a girl on the run from her family is hiding out in West Yorkshire with her drifter boyfriend Aaron. When her brother arrives in town with a gang of thugs in tow, she is forced to flee for her life and faces her darkest night.
cast: Sameena Jabeen Ahmed|Conor McCarron|Gary Lewis|Barry Nunney|Adrian Hussain|Anwar Hussain|Ali Ahmad|Shoby Kaman|Wasim Zakir|Nichola Burley|Kate Dickie|Nicky Bell
keywords: accidental murder|tragic event|crying woman|woman in jeopardy|stabbing
title: Catch Me Daddy
